mapper.select:
with tmp as ( select count(*) as entryCount, type_code from rrm_dict_entry group by type_code ) select a.id, a.type_code, a.type_name, a.description, COALESCE((select entryCount from tmp t where t.type_code = a.type_code),0) as entryCount from rrm_dict_type a
a.item_code = #{dto.itemCode}
a.type_name like concat('%',#{dto.typeName},'%')
order by a.updated_at desc
select count(*) as cnt from rrm_dict_type where type_code = #{typeCode} and item_code = #{itemCode}
